hero.alt1: Dukaan elektaroonik oo casri ah oo leh bandhigyada
hero.alt2: Dukaan elektaroonik oo leh qalab kala duwan
hero.alt3: Qaybta dukaanka ee lagu bandhigayo taleefonada

newsletter.title: Ku Biir Bulshadeena
newsletter.desc: Isdiiwaangali wargeyska oo hel 10% jaban dalabkaaga koowaad iyo dalabyo gaar ah!
newsletter.success: Mahadsanid isdiiwaangalinta! Hubi iimaylkaaga koodka jaban.

about.title: Ku Soo Dhawoow QuickCart
about.tagline: Alaabta ugu fiican, adeeg aan la mid ahayn. Shuraako aamin ah alaabta elektarooniga tayo sare leh.
about.fastDeliveryDesc: Gaarsiin degdeg ah albaabka guriga 24 saac gudahooda
about.topQualityDesc: Teknooloji asal ah 100% oo leh damiin
about.support24Desc: Waan halkan nahay si aan kaa caawino
about.missionText: In la xiriirro dadka teknoolojiyada ugu fiican, si fudud oo qiimo jaban.

terms.text: Marka aad abuurto akoon, waxaad ogolaataa

errors.name: Magacu waa loo baahan yahay
errors.phone: Lambarka taleefanku waa inuu ahaadaa 8-10 lambar
errors.age: Da'ddu waa inay dhex tahay 18 ilaa 55

cart.title: Gaadhigaaga Ganacsiga
cart.emptyMessage: Waxa ay u egtahay inaadan wax ku darin gaadhigaaga ilaa hadda

footer.brandDescription: Bakhaarkaaga guud ee alaabta elektarooniga tayo sare leh iyo adeegga gaarka ah. Waxaan keenaynaa teknoolojiyada ugu dambeysa iyadoo la gaarsiiyo degdeg ah oo la taageero 24/7.

appleAirpodsPro2.name: Apple AirPods Pro 2aad gen
appleAirpodsPro2.description: Apple AirPods Pro (2aad Gen) oo leh MagSafe Case (USB-C) waxay bixiyaan cod fiican, baajinta shiddada firfircooni, iyo isku xirnaan raaxo leh.

boseQuietComfort45.name: Bose QuietComfort 45
boseQuietComfort45.description: Headphone-yada Bose QuietComfort 45 waxaa loo engegeeyay tayada codka ee gaar ah iyo baajinta shiddada aan la mid ahayn.

samsungGalaxyS23.name: Samsung Galaxy S23
samsungGalaxyS23.description: Samsung Galaxy S23 waxay bixisaa khibrad mobile oo dhan oo leh muqaalkeeda horumarsan ee AMOLED.

garminVenu2.name: Garmin Venu 2
garminVenu2.description: Saacadaha smart-ka Garmin Venu 2 waxay isku darsaan raadraac fiitnada horumarsan iyo naqshadeyn xirfad leh.

playstation5.name: PlayStation 5
playstation5.description: PlayStation 5 waxay ciyaaraha u qaadaa heerka xiga iyadoo leh sawirro ultra-HD.

canonEOSR5.name: Canon EOS R5
canonEOSR5.description: Canon EOS R5 waa kaamera aan muraayad lahayn oo beddesa ciyaaraha oo leh sensor full-frame ah oo 45MP.

macbookPro16.name: MacBook Pro 16
macbookPro16.description: MacBook Pro 16, oo ay kartiiso chip-ka Apple M2 Pro, waxay bixisaa waxqabad ka duwan.

sonyWF1000XM5.name: Sony WF-1000XM5
sonyWF1000XM5.description: Dhagayaanada wireless-ka dhabta ah ee Sony WF-1000XM5 waxay keenaan cod dheeldheel leh Hi-Res Audio.

samsungProjector4k.name: Projector-ka Samsung 4k
samsungProjector4k.description: Projector-ka Samsung 4K waxay bixisaa khibrad sinemo oo dheeldheel.

asusROGZephyrusG16.name: ASUS ROG Zephyrus G16
asusROGZephyrusG16.description: Lambarka ciyaaraha ee ASUS ROG Zephyrus G16 waa la kartiisay processor-ka Intel Core i9.

nintendoSwitchOLED.name: Nintendo Switch OLED
nintendoSwitchOLED.description: Shaashad OLED 7 inji, Ciyaar La Qaadi Karo

jblFlip6.name: JBL Flip 6
jblFlip6.description: Dhegaysi Bluetooth Oo La Qaadi Karo

samsungGalaxyTabS8.name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S8
samsungGalaxyTabS8.description: Muqaal 11 inji, Qalinka S Waa La Siiyaa
